main event: Prisoners at Folsom Prison observed a wing-shaped object emitting a jet-like noise on 17 March 1956.
interesting points: The object was wing-shaped, approximately the size of a B-29 aircraft, The object was black in color and emitted red and white lights, It made one orbit over Folsom Prison before heading northwest, The observation lasted for four minutes before the object faded from sight, Preliminary evaluations suggest it could be an aircraft or balloon.
